thread.title: Rihanna's 'Anti' Album Not Coming on November 6
thread.title_full: Rihanna's 'Anti' Album Not Coming on November 6

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Rihanna's 'Anti' Album Not Coming on November 6
text:
Comments After a report emerged claiming the album would come out on November 6, a source close to RiRi said that's not the correct release date. 
Fans will have to wait longer for Rihanna 's new album, " Anti ". After Hits Daily Double reported that the much-anticipated project would finally arrive on November 6, a source close to the singer told Billboard that it's not the correct release date. There's still no official word on when RiRi's eighth studio effort will come out. The Bajan beauty announced the album's title last week during the same event she unveiled its cover art at Los Angeles' Mama Gallery. Designed by Israeli artist Roy Nachum, the artwork features a childhood photo of RiRi holding a balloon with a gold crown covering her eyes. "Sometimes the ones who have sight are the blindest," she said of what she called "[her] favorite album cover [she's] ever done." "Anti" will be RiRi's first full-length since 2012's " Unapologetic ". It has so far spawned "FourFiveSeconds" featuring Kanye West and Sir Paul McCartney , "B**ch Better Have My Money" and "American Oxygen".
